wikipedia_page.main: Abbey Ling (née Burton, born 30 March 1987 in High Wycombe) is a British sports shooter from Nynehead, Somerset. She married fellow Team GB sports shooter Edward Ling in 2014, and has a daughter with him. She works as the head female coach at Ling Shooting School. She represented England at the 2018 Commonwealth Games. She is a five time world champion, World Cup, and commonwealth medalist.

response: He is a crop farmer in Somerset, and also works as a shooting coach. He is married to Abbey Burton, a fellow professional shooter, and has one daughter with her.
As part of the Great Britain Shooting team, British Shooting Kirsty Barr alongside teammates Abbey Burton and Charlotte Kerwood won team Gold at the 2015 World Shotgun Championships, Lonato.
